downloadTitle: Retail Store Connect Technical Reference for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Feature Pack
downloadDescription: Advanced configuration information for the Retail Store Connect component of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Feature Pack.
detailsSection: Advanced configuration information for the Retail Store Connect component of Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 Feature Pack.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
